description: Pharmaceris Viti Melo Day Is A Protective Day Cream Which Is Made With A Clinically & Dermatologically Tested Advanced Formula For Sensitive Skin. It Is Designed To Protect & Nourish The Skin Suffering From Vitiligo (pale White Patches Develop On The Skin) And Depigmentation During The Day. It Is Recommended In Both Adults And Children (5 Years Or Above). This Specialized Cream Decreases Visible Signs Of Vitiligo Thanks To The Unique Interaction Of Rosmarinic Acid And Thioproline In It. This Complex Interacts With Skin Cells To Give Antioxidant (slows Damage To The Cells) Protection And Prevent Mitochondrial Malfunction, Which Is One Of The Causes Of Vitiligo. As The Cream Prevents And Minimizes Damage To Pigment Cells, The Substance Has Healing Capabilities. It Also Contains Naringenin That Inhibits The Genes That Cause Vitiligo (bmal1, Per1). It Activates The Mitochondrial Network, Which Reduces The Chance Of Dermatosis (skin Defect Or Lesion) Symptoms Worsening. Altogether The Mix Of Active Substances Kickstarts The Repigmentation Process, Which Results In A Progressive Evening Out Of Skin Tone. Vdr Present In The Cream Restores The Proper Protective Barrier By Boosting The Vitamin D Receptor, Which Is A Vital Element In Vitiligo Treatment. Uv Protection Is Provided By Photostable Filters At A Very High Level.
